title: NHANES SEQN Respondent Sequence Number
name: SEQN
description: This variable definition for NHANES data dictionaries is for the research subject (respondent) identifier used to coordinate data across datasets.

concept.text: Respondent sequence number (coded as: SEQN from https://wwwn.cdc.gov/Nchs/Nhanes/2017-2018/GLU_J.htm); Respondent sequence number (coded as: SEQN from https://wwwn.cdc.gov/Nchs/Nhanes/2017-2018/DIQ_J.htm); version 2017-2018

missingDataMeaning.text: The participant was not properly registered.

relatesTo.targetMarkdown: NHANES SEQN Respondent Sequence Number [Database Entry: FHIR EvidenceVariable Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper [Authors/Creators]. targetReference.display: NHANES Plasma Fasting Glucose (GLU_J) Data Dictionary
